CustomField.formula: IF( Region__c = Text($CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Region__c) , CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '119' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '127' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AC_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '143' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AB_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '115', $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.CR_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '106' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HL_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '110' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HT_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '141', $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.MB_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '112' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SC_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '124' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.RC_Quebec.Phone_Quebec__c , '' ), CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '119' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP.Phone__c , '127' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AC.Phone__c , '143' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AB.Phone__c , '115' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.CR.Phone__c , '106', $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HL.Phone__c , '106' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.HT.Phone__c , '141' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.MB.Phone__c , '112' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SC.Phone__c , '124' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.RC.Phone__c , '' ) )
CustomField.label: Signature Phone
